oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SGA of Vanderbilt Speakers Committee Presents F. Lee Bailey

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement for F. Lee Bailey "The Defense Never Rests" speech at Vanderbilt University. The event was organized by the Student Government Association at Vanderbilt and is free with a Vandy I.D. or $3.00 for the General Public.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides; Lawyers; Student organizations
Broadsides; Bailey, F. Lee (Francis Lee), 1933- ; Vanderbilt University
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vanderbilt University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: F. Lee Bailey is an American defense lawyer best known for his work in the re-trial of Sam Sheppard, the Medina (My Lai) court martial, and the O. J. Simpson trial.
